meanings.definition: A type of portable, round tent traditionally used by nomadic people in Central Asia.

meanings.sent2: We set up the yurta for our camping trip.
meanings.sent3: The yurta looked like a cozy nest in the vast wilderness.
meanings.sent4: The yurta stood like a protective shell against the elements.
meanings.sent5: The colorful patterns on the yurta made it a beautiful sight in the desert.
